short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts prices from Yuan to GEL for Chinese online stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ”„ Convertor for Shopping is a must-have Chrome extension for ğŸ›ï¸ shoppers in Georgia who frequent Taobao.com. It transforms prices from ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Chinese Yuan (CNY) into ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ª Georgian Lari (GEL) in real time using the latest ğŸ’¹ exchange rates from the National Bank of Georgia (NBG).  

âœ¨ Key Features:
- ğŸ’° Automatic Price Conversion: Instantly converts prices on Taobao.com from CNY to GEL.

Whether you're a frequent ğŸ›’ shopper or just browsing, Convertor for Shopping simplifies your online shopping experience by helping you see the prices in GEL, making it easier to plan your purchases.
